General.Name: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and distribution of healthcare and natural extracts-based beauty products in Thailand and internationally. It offers slimming, anti-wrinkle and anti-spots, and skin care products. The company also provides fat reduction, health, and health drink products, as well as dietary supplement products for pet care. It distributes its products through call centers, sales agents, dropships, and various marketing channels. The company was formerly known as Natural Cosmetics Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited in July 2005. Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lamphun, Thailand.
General.Address: 84/3 Moo 4 Northern Region Ind. Est (W., Lamphun, Thailand, 51000
